EmailTemplate.description: Template para Rejected de Scorecard in Supplier
EmailTemplate.name: Scored ISC
EmailTemplate.subject: Supplier in Scorecard from takedown {!Supplier__c.Name} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} in {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} stage is waiting for Approval.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
